title: pr_btc
author: pr_btc
content: Hello,I am looking for someone who can fulfill orders from Amazon.com and give me some good discount. I regularly need various items from Amazon.com. My daily order volume ranges from $1000 to $10000.If you have can fulfill my orders on regular basis, kindly message me here or contact me on telegram @hesham497Terms:1. Escrow is must. We can do escrow here or any other reputed website which offers escrow service.2. Payment will be sent to escrow service once you place the order & the escrow will be released once the order is delivered to my address/you provide the proof of delivery.3. DO NOT message me asking for any upfront payment. I will only deal through Escrow.4. Payment will be made in cryptocurrency.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Quote from: pr_btc on November 29, 2023, 07:11:52 PMHello,I am looking for someone who can fulfill orders from Amazon.com and give me some good discount.In what wonderful world would someone give you a "discount" to do you a favour? What are we earning to help you? 10% commission?

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: pr_btc on November 29, 2023, 07:11:52 PMHello,I am looking for someone who can fulfill orders from Amazon.com and give me some good discount.If you are looking for a discount, you should have done the order directly by yourself instead of coming here to seek assistance with lesser pay. Do you not know one would need to pay before they receive their order? You want them to do a discount for you; is it for free that they are making the order?Quote from: pr_btc on November 29, 2023, 07:11:52 PM1. Escrow is must. We can do escrow here or any other reputed website which offers escrow service.Would it not be better that the escrow come from this platform because there are reputable members here well known enough to handle  such rather than go outside the platform because no member would agree to it if you insist on choosing an escrow outside the platform. Quote from: pr_btc on November 29, 2023, 07:11:52 PM2. Payment will be sent to escrow service once you place the order & the escrow will be released once the order is delivered to my address/you provide the proof of delivery.I think this aspect of payment terms should be the other way around, OP. You should make payment first  to escrow for confirmation, to see your seriousness first. Then your vendor confirms your payment with escrow and places the order  because it would be your address that the order would likely contain. When you receive the order, then they get their payment. I think this way you will make headway with your offer; otherwise, nobody would give in to your request to deal with you, and to start with, you are just a newbie here with no reputation.

comments.author: pr_btc
comments.body: Quote from: paid2 on November 30, 2023, 01:02:52 AMQuote from: pr_btc on November 29, 2023, 07:11:52 PMHello,I am looking for someone who can fulfill orders from Amazon.com and give me some good discount.In what wonderful world would someone give you a "discount" to do you a favour? What are we earning to help you? 10% commission?  No offence. But i think that you are living in different world. People who like to convert their balance or gift card, do orders for others in order convert their balance into cash. I think you have never heard of purse.io which got closed recently. I have been getting my orders fulfilled on purse.io since a long time and getting good discounts. But now they have closed their operations, thats why i am trying to reach people here.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: pr_btc on November 30, 2023, 04:29:38 PMQuote from: paid2 on November 30, 2023, 01:02:52 AMQuote from: pr_btc on November 29, 2023, 07:11:52 PMHello,I am looking for someone who can fulfill orders from Amazon.com and give me some good discount.In what wonderful world would someone give you a "discount" to do you a favour? What are we earning to help you? 10% commission?  No offence. But i think that you are living in different world. People who like to convert their balance or gift card, do orders for others in order convert their balance into cash. I think you have never heard of purse.io which got closed recently. I have been getting my orders fulfilled on purse.io since a long time and getting good discounts. But now they have closed their operations, thats why i am trying to reach people here.So basically you want to buy gift cards at a discount.you should ask for that.  we have had amazon gift card sellers that were honest and on this site.

comments.author: pr_btc
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on November 30, 2023, 04:37:25 PMQuote from: pr_btc on November 30, 2023, 04:29:38 PMQuote from: paid2 on November 30, 2023, 01:02:52 AMQuote from: pr_btc on November 29, 2023, 07:11:52 PMHello,I am looking for someone who can fulfill orders from Amazon.com and give me some good discount.In what wonderful world would someone give you a "discount" to do you a favour? What are we earning to help you? 10% commission?  No offence. But i think that you are living in different world. People who like to convert their balance or gift card, do orders for others in order convert their balance into cash. I think you have never heard of purse.io which got closed recently. I have been getting my orders fulfilled on purse.io since a long time and getting good discounts. But now they have closed their operations, thats why i am trying to reach people here.So basically you want to buy gift cards at a discount.you should ask for that.  we have had amazon gift card sellers that were honest and on this site.Not gift card. Gift cards have lot of issues and most of the time they get blocked after redeeming them if purchased with any suspicious method. If someone has genuine gift card so he may use them to order for me.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: paid2 on November 30, 2023, 01:02:52 AMIn what wonderful world would someone give you a "discount" to do you a favour? What are we earning to help you? 10% commission?  Well, actually, Bitcoin is worth a lot more than amazon gift cards, plus, buying Bitcoin is hardly 1:1, in most countries it costs some fee to convert your fiat to btc, and then you get the privacy aspect of transferring your fiat to btc without using an exchange.So websites like Purse.io or Bitoff are real and legit, you place an amazon order, chose your desired discount and someone else picks it up, it is very common to get 5-10% discount orders accepted on the same day, 10-20% discount might take a while.It is safer for OP and those who want to trade their amazon for BTC to use the websites mentioned above.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: pr_btc on November 30, 2023, 04:51:17 PMQuote from: philipma1957 on November 30, 2023, 04:37:25 PMQuote from: pr_btc on November 30, 2023, 04:29:38 PMQuote from: paid2 on November 30, 2023, 01:02:52 AMQuote from: pr_btc on November 29, 2023, 07:11:52 PMHello,I am looking for someone who can fulfill orders from Amazon.com and give me some good discount.In what wonderful world would someone give you a "discount" to do you a favour? What are we earning to help you? 10% commission?  No offence. But i think that you are living in different world. People who like to convert their balance or gift card, do orders for others in order convert their balance into cash. I think you have never heard of purse.io which got closed recently. I have been getting my orders fulfilled on purse.io since a long time and getting good discounts. But now they have closed their operations, thats why i am trying to reach people here.So basically you want to buy gift cards at a discount.you should ask for that.  we have had amazon gift card sellers that were honest and on this site.Not gift card. Gift cards have lot of issues and most of the time they get blocked after redeeming them if purchased with any suspicious method. If someone has genuine gift card so he may use them to order for me.no one will do that at a discount on this website.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: pr_btc on November 30, 2023, 04:29:38 PMNo offence. But i think that you are living in different world. People who like to convert their balance or gift card, do orders for others in order convert their balance into cash. I think you have never heard of purse.io which got closed recently. I have been getting my orders fulfilled on purse.io since a long time and getting good discounts. But now they have closed their operations, thats why i am trying to reach people here.In that case you'll have to search for an alternative of Purse.io instead of asking people on this forum to do that for you. No one will ever do that here because most of the users of this forum love to have trades with Bitcoin only and that's why finding someone to do that for you is going to be very difficult or you can say close to impossible. Although, I used to see the user who were selling Amazon gift cards on digital goods board but I haven't visited that board for a long time and that's why I don't know that are those users still selling Amazon gift cards or not. But, I would alert you that there can be some newbies on that board offering you to purchase gift cards from them but they can be scammers and to avoid being scammed you should look for a reputed escrow of the forum.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: pr_btc on November 30, 2023, 04:29:38 PMNo offence. But i think that you are living in different world. People who like to convert their balance or gift card, do orders for others in order convert their balance into cash. I think you have never heard of purse.io which got closed recently. I have been getting my orders fulfilled on purse.io since a long time and getting good discounts. But now they have closed their operations, thats why i am trying to reach people here.Look for alternatives, then. Saves more time and stress.You are not going to be able to fulfil your desired volume with those terms of yours. This is no gift card marketplace where you will have several members competitively giving you offers. At most, you will just have a couple of members in a long time accepting your offer for that one gift card they are trying to get rid of, but they have no choice else where.Sorry if it may sound rough, but that's the reality.

comments.author: monerobr0
comments.body: There are projects that provide similar services with Monero:- monero.shopping (PRE-ALPHA)- proxysto.re - mostly for Germany + option of local pick up- anonshop.app - operates in the US and on Amazon, utilizing Amazon lockersNon Monero:- bitoff.io- alagoria.com- purse.io - closed
